faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our GSE equipment and related services.

items.question: What certifications do your equipment have?
items.answer: All our equipment complies with the Machinery Directive 2006/42/EC and EN 12312-1 standard. Each product is delivered with EU declaration of conformity, SWL test certificate and user manual.

items.question: What are your delivery times?
items.answer: For stocked references, allow 2 to 4 weeks in metropolitan France. Custom productions require 6 to 10 weeks.

items.question: Do you offer maintenance contracts?
items.answer: Yes, LLEDO Industries offers preventive maintenance contracts including complete inspection, hydraulic checks, SWL testing and wear parts replacement.

items.question: What is the warranty?
items.answer: Standard warranty is 24 months parts and labor. Extensions up to 5 years are available.

services.title: Our Expertise
services.subtitle: A collective of 5 complementary entities to cover all your industrial engineering needs

mpeb.title: MPEB - Precision Machining
mpeb.description: Core entity of the group since 1989, MPEB specializes in 3, 4 and 5-axis precision machining, complex mechanical part manufacturing and mechanical assembly for aerospace and defense sectors.
expertise: Unit parts and small series manufacturing

egi.title: EGI - Engineering Office
egi.description: EGI provides technical design expertise, structural calculations and custom solution development. Our engineering office supports clients from initial concept through final product validation.
expertise: Structural calculations and material strength analysis

frem.title: FREM - Industrial Maintenance
frem.description: FREM delivers preventive and corrective maintenance, on-site equipment installation and technical support. Our teams work at client facilities to ensure equipment availability and performance.
expertise: Preventive and corrective industrial equipment maintenance
Periodic inspections and regulatory compliance checks

mgp.title: MGP - Sheet Metal & Boilermaking
mgp.description: MGP complements the group's offering with sheet metal, boilermaking, welding and mechanical assembly capabilities. MGP brings complementary expertise across diversified markets.

aerotools.title: LLEDO Aerotools - GSE Equipment
aerotools.description: Division dedicated to developing and marketing GSE (Ground Support Equipment) for light helicopters. Towbars, lifting trolleys and specialized tooling compliant with aeronautical standards.
